gra:ServiceDescription.gra:ServiceDescriptionSummaryText: Service for accessing information about a corrections subject with respect to release.

gra:ServiceRealWorldEffects.gra:RealWorldEffectDescriptionText: Service for Medicaid Entitlements so that he individual has appropriate coverage, and help minimize costs for the correctional facilities.
Service to obtain Criminal History information.
Service for Treatment Status to be shared between the community based service providers and the supervisory authorities.
Service for Share Notifications about the individual with a broad array of stakeholders based as the individual proceeds through the corrections process.
Service for Risk Assessment information so that the community based service providers better understand the risks associated with an individual.
Service for accessing information about a corrections subject with respect to release.
Service for Inquiries about an individual to obtain demographic, release and risk information.
Service for Treatment Information about the individual with community based providers so they are able to provide adequate treatment while the individual is released.
Service for Housing Information so that the individual is housed appropriately based on their specific housing needs and risk profiles

gra:Sponsors.gra:Sponsor: Office of Justice Programs, U.S. Department of Justice
